attributes.review: If all lives matter so much why are minorities getting killed by white police and citizens of very single day huh? Trump’s duty as a president is to protect Every single one of his citizens. It is not a surprise that the US is a country full of immigrants and diverse communities. Why run for president if you only REALLY care about one of them? “Make America Great Again” means make America white again. You have all your little supporters on your side but trust that we are stronger than you’ll ever think we are. Trump is NOT winning the election. If he does, this country will be in dictatorship, with EVERYONES rights in danger. Even the white people’s. So for the love of god just open your eyes and see that Trump is only gonna make America worse than it is already becoming.
attributes.title: Black Lives Matter. Natives Lives Matter. Hispanics Lives Matter. Asian Lives Matter

attributes.review: this app literally took 24 hours to install. after it installed i got a notification that someone had gotten ahold of all of my info through this app and were on their way to kidnap me. i disregarded the message and continued to open it and then i got a glitching screen and then out of nowhere an orange appeared claiming he was my president —- i was like chileee no , my president is a handsome 3 haired tanned man not this orange 🍊 but anyways after a few minutes of being on the app i closed it and didnt reopen it at all that day but that night when i was sleeping i woke up the sound of million of notifications from this app saying that Donald trump was a white supremacist and needed to be kicked outta the white house and i was like nooo not my trumpy wumpy🥺🥺🥺🥺 i suggest you dont download it . it stalks you . anyways trump 2020😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍
attributes.title: no❤️

attributes.review: so the other day i was walking my pet cheeto and all of a sudden something shoots down to the ground and it opens ITS OUR OOMPA LOOMPA PRESIDENT I SCREAMED SO LOUD BECAUSE WHY IS HE WEARING A HALLOWEEN COSTUME ITS ONLY JULY so then he got his tranquilizer and shot my pet cheeto puff he must’ve got offended because there can only be 1 donald trump . but then he shot my house with a shrinking gun and it shrunk and he took it away then he went to go pick my house up and the oompa loompa shook my house and messed it up after he shook it the oompa loompa had the audacity to step on my little shrunk house and stepped on it . then after that i’m now homeless but i snuck into the whites house and i think i’m in Melania trumps room and now i’m being chased by secret service so if i don’t make it out alive just tell my mom i love her. IM RUNNING FOR MY LIFE AND THEY ARE SO MEAN DONT EVER DOWNLOAD THE TRUMP 2020 APP ITS SO BAD THEY ARE SO MEAN TO YOUUU
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER 🔪

attributes.review: decided i would test out this app to see what all the 😤fuss😤 was about. i thought to myself, this app cant 🤧possibly🤧 be as bad as people are saying it is... upon further inspection, ive realized that it is the 😡WORST😡 app ever created. i experienced issues almost ✨immediately ✨ after installing. i started feeling extremely lightheaded & experienced ‼️SEVERE‼️hallucinations. i started seeing in only different shades of 🍊orange.🍊 i also immediately felt my IQ 📉decrease.📉 luckily i deleted the app before i lost all sanity. 😩 one of my friends experienced a serious 🧠mental breakdown🧠 after downloading the app. she’s still in the 🚑psych ward🚑 because of it. you better hope you have good health insurance before downloading this app. you 💯WILL💯 have a horrible experience. GET THIS APP 🚀REMOVED🚀 it is a SERIOUS 🚨HEALTH HAZARD🚨
attributes.title: ✨🧚🏼disgusting🧚🏼✨

attributes.review: I never thought I would write a one star review until this very day. I am truly disappointed in this app and the tragedy it has created in my phone. Ever since I downloaded this app my phone started to crash every single day. I went to the Apple store to see what was wrong with it. They said it was the app. I was deeply frustrated and crushed to the bones. Now, I am known to be a very honest person, so believe me when I tell you: This app is absolutely terrible. Bad quality, very disorganized, and kept logging me out of the app. Whenever I open the app my phone is instantly heated. Would most definitely not recommend the app if you CARE for your phone! I am truly devastated. Never thought I would see myself so Agitated.. ESPECIALLY since I’m a very optimistic person. I am disgusted.
attributes.title: Truly Disappointed

attributes.review: I got this app to support the one and only ✨Cheese Cheto✨ Zaddy Tronk but when I downloaded and opened the app it told me that it could sense my Mexican Taco fingers and started deleting all my apps and turned off the life support of my grandmother in the other room since I had my phone plugged into the charger and the nanobots went in through my electrical system. But after that it powered off my entire house and also said that if I even thought about using the bathroom that ICE would be deployed straight to my house and deport me and my Taco Bell chicken wrap family so I had to hold in my urine for a solid week until I ended up getting an infection. This app killed my grandma, worst app ever, do not download but if you do please be completely honest, it would be terrible if people lied in their reviews😔
attributes.userName: Ceo of Taco Bell Crunch wrap
attributes.title: This app gave me a UTI

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what Donald Trump’s ideologies were like, since my parents are Trump supporters. Upon downloading the app and logging on, my phone immediately crashed. I was unable to swipe, use my home button, or even shut off my phone. I just had to wait until my phone could resolve itself. I then waited an extra 10 minutes to see if anything would change and upon opening up the app again, my phone completely glitches and shut itself off. This app is VIRUS!! I immediately deleted it and had no more problems of crashing. On the short time I was actually on the app, I further learned of Trump’s skewed ideas and even got a better feeling for exactly how much he doesn’t care about the people in this country. DO NOT GET THIS APP IT WILL MESS UP YOUR PHONE!!!
attributes.title: BROKE MY PHONE

attributes.review: You are the blind person ever. All you do is say that we are doing fine and we are the best. We aren’t the best nor the greatest. You literally cut ties with the world wide medical group. Why would you do that in our time of need you cut of the one group that can help us. You remember those peaceful protests that were going on until you made the force push them back and pepper spray them. Oh that sat that you probably had someone else do it for you. Probably because you are the most brain dead human ever compared to a baby you look like an idiot. You are nothing but rich maybe not even that you are horrible at running this country. You are blind and ignorant and somehow managed to win election. On promises you haven’t even accomplished 1/4 of in your 4 year term.
attributes.title: I hope you lose the election

attributes.review: My friends had recommended me this app after inviting me over to their KoolKidsKlub meeting, which I politely declined.👁👄👁 After I had told them no they kidnapped me and forced me to download this app and made me scroll through for hours as this orange plump man was lectured me on how he was going to force the minorities to build walls into twelve factions and we were going to fight to the death for our faction😳🦠😬I then went home scared for my life and immediately deleted the app in fear of my well being and mental stability. I joined a mental hospital and found fellow members who were all put under the same stress as me and we have planned to band together to save his abused son Barron Trump.🤩❤️🤤He is a darling little sweetheart and we need to save him from his homophobic, sexist, racist, abusive father. #freebarron2020
attributes.title: Awful app join my cause🧚‍♀️🎊🎉🎂🥳

attributes.review: I got this app to see what animal I wanted to vote for this year and some orange man came up on the screen...it truest scared me so I threw my phone because I have an irrational fear of Cheeto men. When my phone hit the ground it broke into a million pieces and several shards of glass when into my eye. I believe that would be Donald trumps fault that I am now partially blind. Now my phone is broken and I don’t have the money to fix it because trump is giving all the money to the military and the rich. I also don’t have money to go to the hospital to get the glass out of my eye because we don’t have free health care so here we are with glass shards sticking out of my eye! I am on a library computer right now and just felt like my story had to be told because if all life’s matter... why doesn’t mine? #blm #acab #dumptrump #genzRULES
attributes.title: THIS APP IS BUSTED
